    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access中Permission的使用

      类型参数类型为Permission的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  TableAuthManager.PermissionCache<T extends Permission> 
      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access中Permission的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  TablePermission
      Represents an authorization for access for the given actions, optionally restricted to the given column family or column qualifier, over the given table.
      class  UserPermission
      Represents an authorization for access over the given table, column family plus qualifier, for the given user.
      类型参数类型为Permission的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      Cache of global permissions
